Comment: This field is not used in the game but can be used by us to take notes about the scavenger hunt

Dialogue:
Hold it right there!

You are now entering the Prins Hendrikkade. A notorious admiral that hunts pirates lives in this street. Go find his housenumber for me so I can take my revenge. His portrait is said to be displayed on the wall above the window.
No no no... That's where your mom lives. I know that number far too well. Now try finding that bastard admirals house again

That looks like the right house. Now don't dally and keep moving. We don't want anybody to spot you here.

The next location I want you to go to can be described as ...
This is a multiple choice test
